events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from candidate Alex Morgan. The resume highlights extensive experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's background as a software developer with skills in DevOps and cloud services.
Recruiter Jamie Lee has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process for the software engineer role, ensuring smooth communication and follow-ups.
Initial phone screening was conducted with Alex Morgan, revealing strong problem-solving skills and enthusiasm for cloud-based technologies.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed with the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled with the senior engineering team for May 5th, focusing on full stack development skills and DevOps practices.
